name: oblivious

effect.x_y: This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate. If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate. If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.

short_effect: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.

flavor_text.x_y: Keeps the Pokémon from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Keeps the Pokémon from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
